hopobject.body:
Linux and u-boot sources

The Linux and u-boot sources for the BeagleBoard, BeagleBoard-xM and BeagleBone are maintained on Github.com/BeagleBoard.

The production and validation of these kernels is done with the Angstrom Distribution and meta-ti with the OpenEmbedded build system. The sources shared here are done for convenience for those familiar with the git version control system. To build the bootloader and kernel...
